songs.title: Break the Rules
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]:
Electric lights
Blow my mind
I feel alright

[Pre-Chorus]:
Never stop, it's how we ride
Coming up until we die

[Verse 2]:
You catch my eye
Bitch, you wanna fly?
I'm so alive

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]: (2x)
I don't wanna go to school
I just wanna break the rules
Boys and girls across the world
Putting on our dancing shoes
Going to the discotheque
Getting high and getting wrecked
I don't wanna go to school
I just wanna break the rules

[Verse 2]
I'm such a star
Queen Boulevard
Blaze through the dark

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]

[Bridge]:
Get my guitar
Sunglasses on
So light it up

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]

[Outro]:
Na na na na na na na
